texts.label: section_header
texts.orig: Oceanic Time Warner Cable and Watchit Media Content and License Agreement
texts.text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable and Watchit Media Content and License Agreement

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Effective Dates: September 1, 2006, August 31, 2007
texts.text: Effective Dates: September 1, 2006, August 31, 2007

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Watchit agrees to provide Oceanic Time Warner Cable the following content:
texts.text: Watchit agrees to provide Oceanic Time Warner Cable the following content:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: - Watchit Gaming Guides
texts.text: - Watchit Gaming Guides

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: - Lunchtime with Ira segments every week
texts.text: - Lunchtime with Ira segments every week

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Watchit will provide the content on BetaSp format and reserves the right to modify the content to reflect sponsorship by an advertiser and advertisers.
texts.text: Watchit will provide the content on BetaSp format and reserves the right to modify the content to reflect sponsorship by an advertiser and advertisers.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Oceanic Time Warner Cable agrees to not edit or modify the above content.
texts.text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable agrees to not edit or modify the above content.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Oceanic Time Warner Cable will use the content solely on channel 777, the Las Vegas channel.
texts.text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable will use the content solely on channel 777, the Las Vegas channel.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: In the event that Oceanic Time Warner Cable removes the above content and or terminates this agreement prior to December 31, 2006, Oceanic Time Warner Cable agrees to pay a cancellation fee of Five Thousand Dollars ($5,000) per month multiplied by the number of months remain on the agreement.
texts.text: In the event that Oceanic Time Warner Cable removes the above content and or terminates this agreement prior to December 31, 2006, Oceanic Time Warner Cable agrees to pay a cancellation fee of Five Thousand Dollars ($5,000) per month multiplied by the number of months remain on the agreement.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Watchit shall have the exclusive right to sell third party advertising as sponsors of their content and will have the right to brand the content under the Watchit brand and place a "bug" on the screen identifying the content with a Watchit trademark.
texts.text: Watchit shall have the exclusive right to sell third party advertising as sponsors of their content and will have the right to brand the content under the Watchit brand and place a "bug" on the screen identifying the content with a Watchit trademark.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Oceanic Time Warner Cable will include the following disclaimer on the Watchit Content: "The materials shown are for entertainment purposes only and does not provide any guarantees of winning or improving your odds of winning on this program. The rules of the games as shown may not apply to all properties and may change from time to time."
texts.text: Oceanic Time Warner Cable will include the following disclaimer on the Watchit Content: "The materials shown are for entertainment purposes only and does not provide any guarantees of winning or improving your odds of winning on this program. The rules of the games as shown may not apply to all properties and may change from time to time."

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ocean Time Warner Cable will provide Watchit with data on viewership to both Channel 777 and specifically to the content provided by Watchit.
texts.text: Ocean Time Warner Cable will provide Watchit with data on viewership to both Channel 777 and specifically to the content provided by Watchit.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Ocean Time Warner Cable will be able to not include any content that it deems inappropriate or distasteful.
texts.text: Ocean Time Warner Cable will be able to not include any content that it deems inappropriate or distasteful.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This agreement will be in effect until the end of 2006 and will be evaluated at that time.
texts.text: This agreement will be in effect until the end of 2006 and will be evaluated at that time.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Both parties agree to discuss use of information gathered form this arrangement before using it in any kind of promotional or public message.
texts.text: Both parties agree to discuss use of information gathered form this arrangement before using it in any kind of promotional or public message.

texts.text: Accepted by:
